data.name: SOAP Server
data.xml_template:
<route id="{{source}}">
    {{#if (not_empty soap_action)}}
    <setHeader name="SOAPAction">
		<constant>{{soap_action}}</constant>
	</setHeader>
	{{/if}}
    <from uri="cxf://{{protocol}}://{{hostname}}:{{port}}{{path}}{{querystring cxf_query_params cxf_extra_query_params}}" />
    {{applyUnmarshal "xml"}}
    {{#if (eq convertToJson true)}}
    <process ref="processorXMLtoJSON"/>
    {{applyUnmarshal "json"}}
    {{/if}}
    <multicast>
        {{#each target}}
        <to uri="direct:{{this}}"/>
        {{/each}}
    </multicast>

    <choice>
        {{#each responses}}
            {{#if (ne this.condition "default")}}
                <when>
                    <simple>{{this.condition}}</simple>
                    <setBody><simple trim="false"><![CDATA[{{safe this.code}}]]></simple></setBody>
                </when>
             {{/if}}
             {{#if (eq this.condition "default")}}
                <otherwise>
                    <setBody><simple trim="false"><![CDATA[{{safe this.code}}]]></simple></setBody>
                </otherwise>
            {{/if}}
        {{/each}}
    </choice>
</route>
